titleStmt.title: A letter out of Lancashire to a friend in London, giving some account of the late tryals there together with some seasonable and proper remarks upon it, recommended to the wisdom of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Wagstaffe. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
